Notes.Text:
The following bug has been fixed:

    * Specially crafted time zone files could cause a heap overflow in
      glibc.

Security Issue reference:

    * CVE-2009-5029
      <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2009-5029>
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Integer overflow in the __tzfile_read function in glibc before 2.15 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted timezone (TZ) file, as demonstrated using vsftpd.
